channel.title: Team-Setup on rasyidhakim.com
channel.description: Recent content in Team-Setup on rasyidhakim.com

item.description:
Team setup ideas

Everyone is a full-stack philosophy. Specialize if required. To do this, a clean interface, robust and well-documented software is mandatory.

JBD needs to be open source first company. Built on open source, give back to open source.
